author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

This PR provides, as discussed in the Simulation and Geometry meeting, an update of the ```Geometry``` packages ```MTDCommonData```, ```MTDNumberingBuilder``` and ```MTDGeometryBuilder``` where unit tests are implemented by exploiting the test plugins. A squeezed version of the output specially meant for these tests is added, and reference files are built for scenario D50. <s>The second commit proposes these files in ```data``` directories, and **SHOULD NOT BE INTEGRATED AS IT IS**, since the files are too large to be stored in CMSSW. This is just for test and demonstration, separate data packages should be added in case.</s>

Anyway, before doing that, I would like to discuss with @smuzaffar @ianna @cvuosalo @silviodonato a possible alternative: create a single package ```Geometry/TestReference``` under cms-data where to store all the possible test references, avoiding a multiplication of packages with 1 or very few files.

The new package ```Geometry/TestReference``` is added, and an external cms-data package is filled with reference data files.

#### PR validation:

```scram b runtests``` runs and give no error in local tests
title: MTD geometry: unit tests
